meanings.meaning: get caught/found with your hand in the cookie jar

vlive.korean: 들키면 어떻게 돼요? What if they figure out? 듣기 View video BTS : Run BTS! 2019 - EP.87
[어떻게 되긴 들키면 탈락이지 뭐...] [You're out obviously...] View video BTS : Run BTS! 2019 - EP.87
들키면 왜? 들키면 안 되나? - 들키면 탈락이에요? So what? I can't get exposed? - Do I fail if I expose my identity? 듣기 View video BTS : Run BTS! 2019 - EP.88
vlive.english: So what? I can't get exposed? - Do I fail if I expose my identity?

vlive.korean: [이제 이해] - 들키면 탈락입니다 - 진짜? - 진짜? [Gets the rule now] - You fail if you are exposed. - Really? - For real? 듣기 View video BTS : Run BTS! 2019 - EP.88
vlive.english: [Gets the rule now] - You fail if you are exposed. - Really? - For real?

vlive.korean: 들키면 안 되는데. We can't get caught. 듣기 View video MOMO X : [지각방지 라이브] 지각한 네 자리는 없어! 스트레이 키즈 편

examples.korean: If you steal money and get caught, you suffer. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 돈을 훔치다 들키면, 벌은 받는 것은 당신입니다. Neungyule
examples.english: If you steal money and get caught, you suffer. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: No sense getting caught. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 들키면 재미 없어. Neungyule
examples.english: No sense getting caught. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: If you are found out, you will catch it. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 들키면 꾸지람을 듣는다 Dong-a's Prime English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: If you are found out, you will catch it. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: People were fined five shillings if they were caught exchanging gifts. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 사람들은 선물을 교환하다가 들키면 5실링의 벌금을 물어야 했다. TIMES CORE
examples.english: People were fined five shillings if they were caught exchanging gifts. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: In Singapore, it is said that you have to pay a fine if you are caught chewing gum! 듣기 Add to Wordbook 싱가폴에서는 껌을 씹다 들키면 벌금을 내야 한다는 얘기가 있어요! TIMES CORE
examples.english: In Singapore, it is said that you have to pay a fine if you are caught chewing gum! Add to Wordbook
